Title: A Clutch of Hope
Description:
<The broodmother lies dead, coiled around a single egg. She gave her life to keep it from the spiders.

You should take it to Nebb. He and the other Grubtenders would know what to do with it.>
RewardText:
This not just any egg. Mother egg.

<Nebb takes the egg from you. He holds it with reverence.>

With this, grubs not just survive. They thrive. Thank you. We protect.
